author: assaf
msg: Changed color scheme (again, can't make up my mind!)
Root URL now redirects to task list (good idea not to overload same URL).

author: assaf
msg: Added cancel, suspend, resume and delegate task actions.

author: assaf
msg: Tasks can render using only their description (e.g. offline tasks).
Perform URL only used when performing task by owner.
Otherwise either using details URL or task description.
The perform query parameter is no longer in use.
Post completion redirects back to task list.
